question.title: How to debug on stage environment on AEM Cloud for custom service Interface and implementation class
question.body:
We have a popup functionality that works fine on AEM as a Cloud in Dev and Local environments, but it’s not working in Stage and Prod. Here’s the setup:

We are using Sling Model Exporter and an AEM front-end component built with React.js + TypeScript in an SPA application. We created a service interface and implementation class. Experience Fragments have been created, and the AEM component with dialogs is added. The backend service includes fromDate and toDate options.

The AEM component itself is working, but the backend service is not functioning in Stage and Prod. Could you please help me debug this issue on AEM as a Cloud in the Stage environment?

question_comments.body: " but the backend service is not functioning in Stage and Prod" - does the jars loaded properly? i'm not familiar with AEM cloud, but is it possible to check the OSGi modules?
